name: Don't get to strong
description:
Made for the godot wild jam #36

You have to run and get out before your character gets to strong and cant handle the power anymore

Everything should be finished. If you do find bugs however please let me know.
Game might be a little hard at start, sorry for that.

You can use WAD / arrows to move and even a controller (mouse needed for selections on screen)

Theme uncontrollable growth -> your character will get stronger but you wont be able to decide how it gets stronger/faster and your character will also become more and more uncontrollable

Tried to make something around the wildcards but just something minor so i only count them as half wildcards lol

Physician -> your health is actually a timer that counts down

Now you see me -> one of the random powers is becoming more and more invisible

Competitive spirit -> You can see the time/remaining health after finishing a run
